item.title: ::switch command help
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Hey guys, ive tryed so much stuff to try and get the ::switch command 2 work!!! Ive added ancient magic, but all i need now is a ::switch command, what will convert you 2 ancient, and when u use again back 2 normal magic!!

Any help?

If i added this to my client.java where will the alters appear?

} if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 0) { emotes = 2; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic."); } else if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 1) { emotes = 0; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic.");

Or wtf does all this mean LOL?

Read full topic
